summary: 2008  was a leap year starting on Tuesday of the Christian or Common Era, in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
2008  was a leap year starting on Tuesday  of the Gregorian calendar, the 2008th year of the Common Era  and Anno Domini  designations, the 8th year of the 3rd millennium, the 8th year of the 21st century, and the 9th year of the 2000s decade.
2008 was designated as:
International Year of Languages
International Year of Sanitation
International Year of the Potato

^ "General Assembly Proclaims 2008 International Year of Languages, in Effort to Promote Unity in Diversity, Global Understanding". United Nations. Archived from the original on 1 November 2008. Retrieved 2008-11-02.
